snippet.title: ARC Raiders: Advanced Tips to Raid Like a Pro — Outsmart Enemies & Dominate the Map
snippet.description:
Ready to level up your ARC Raiders gameplay? In this video, Codiak from Legacy Gaming breaks down the most important pro tips, strategies, and advanced mechanics every raider needs to know—whether you’re running solo or pushing raids with a squad. From movement tech and stealth fundamentals to crosshair settings, gear optimization, grenades, and extraction strategies, this guide will help you raid smarter, react faster, and survive more encounters topside.

0:00 - Intro
0:23 - Custom Crosshairs & Settings
1:08 - Stick to the Shadows
1:57 - Movement Tricks
4:48 - Overpowered Tools
5:52 - Secure a Snap Hook
7:04 - Grenades Are Essential
8:36 - Skins DO Matter
9:49 - Adrenaline Is Basically Free
10:54 - Raid Smarter Not Harder
11:48 - The Sounds of Silence
13:42 - Better Communication
14:28 - Watch That Timer
15:24 - Subscribe for More
